TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartCancelEventHandler(object sender, WebPartCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartCancelEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 类的 、 或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event, event, or event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的方法时，将调用委托事件，事件，或引发事件。The method specified in the delegate is called when a event, event, or event is raised. 页开发人员可以通过添加为 Web 部件事件提供自定义处理程序`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`属性，`OnWebPartClosing`属性，或`OnWebPartDeleting`属性设为``页上，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute, `OnWebPartClosing` attribute, or `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 此外可以以编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关以编程方式将分配一个事件处理程序的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 连接事件处理程序方法与事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
